instruction: Generate a set of 10 test questions from the topic "American History".
output:
1. Who was the first president of the United States?
2. What was the main cause of the American Revolution?
3. What is the name of the document that declared US independence?
4. What amendment to the US Constitution abolished slavery?
5. Who was the first woman elected to the US Congress?
6. Who wrote the US Constitution?
7. What event ended the US involvement in the Vietnam War?
8. What was the name of the first successful colonies settled by Europeans in America?
9. What was the main cause of the American Civil War?
10. Who was president during the Great Depression?
